titles.title: Electricity Windfall Profit Tax Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a windfall profits tax on electricity sold in Orange and San Diego Counties in California during the summer of 2000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/18/2000--Introduced. Electricity Windfall Profit Tax Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an excise tax equal to the windfall profit on the retail sale of electricity for use in Orange and San Diego Counties in California during June, July, or August of 2000. Appropriates revenues from such tax to Orange and San Diego Counties to provide relief to residents for the high costs of electricity incurred during the summer of 2000.
